title: Strengthening Software Development Practice Competencies: Collaborative Discourse-Based Teacher Professional Development Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic instructional design and language education experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can collaboratively develop language education design frameworks with peer teachers through participatory discourse processes.
Participants can design and implement innovative language learning activities according to the ADDIE model phases.
Participants can perform eight roles (mediator, connector, facilitator, etc.) flexibly within a Teacher Redesign Team (TrDT) based on situational needs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
